#summary Visualization and graph related concepts.
#labels Featured

= Details =

  * Node:  a single graphed object or item;
  * Edge: a link between two nodes;
  * GraphML: a standard XML-based graph dataprovider structure;
  * Node Renderer: the look and function of a node which is based on the concept of an item renderer;
  * Layout:  a mathematically based method/algorithm for drawing nodes and edges in an ordered structure;
  * Degrees of Separation: the distance between interrelated nodes, e.g. a node link node relation represents two degrees of separation.
